sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.persistence

Interface ResourceRegistration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Registration
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SerializedResourceData
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResourceRegistration, LiveResourceRegistration, ResourcePersistenceData

    public interface ResourceRegistration
extends Registration
    Current registration status of a Resource instance. The current registration status is obtained from the underlying resource.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
      Compares the specified object with this resource registration for equality.
      java.lang.Class<? extends Listener> getListenerType()
      Returns the listener type to which is the underlying resource registered.
      Resource<?> getResource()
      Returns the underlying resource.
      java.lang.String getResourceName()
      Returns the underlying resource name.
      int hashCode()
      Returns the hash code value for this resource registration.

        isProvided, isRegistered

    • Method Detail

      • getListenerType

        java.lang.Class<? extends Listener> getListenerType()
        Returns the listener type to which is the underlying resource registered.

      • getResource

        Resource<?> getResource()
        Returns the underlying resource.

      • getResourceName

        java.lang.String getResourceName()
        Returns the underlying resource name.

      • equals

        boolean equals(@Nullable
             java.lang.Object o)
        Compares the specified object with this resource registration for equality. Returns true if the specified object is also a resource registration and the two registrations have the same listener type and resource name. This definition ensures that this method works properly across different implementations of the resource registration interface.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - an object to be compared for equality with this resource registration
        Returns:
        true if the specified object is equal to this resource registration, false otherwise

      • hashCode

        int hashCode()
        Returns the hash code value for this resource registration. The hash code of a resource registration should be equivalent to the result of Objects.hash(Object...) for listener type and resource name.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the hash code value for this resource registration
